description: Made using ready-made mud cake topped with marshmallows, this easy s'mores chocolate cake recipe is the perfect hack for those impromptu drop-ins.
name: S'Mores Chocolate Mud Cake Hack Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place remaining cake on top of caramel. Place 6 marshmallows in a microwave-safe bowl. Microwave on high for 1 minute, then immediately spoon over top of second cake. Halve remaining marshmallows and arrange on top of cake. Using a blowtorch, lightly brown marshmallows. Drizzle with remaining caramel and scatter over remaining biscuit. Decorate with Easter eggs, then serve.

Halve remaining marshmallows and arrange on top of cake. Using a blowtorch, lightly brown marshmallows. Drizzle with remaining caramel and scatter over remaining biscuit. Decorate with Easter eggs, then serve.
